articles.description: The company said in a statement it would deploy stacks combined with purifiers and separators to provide a dynamic and efficient solution that can integrate with renewable energy resources and produce green hydrogen.
articles.content: New Delhi: Hild Electric Private Limited, which manufactures and deploys electrolysers, announced it has been selected as the Alkaline electrolyser technology provider of NTPC Renewable Energy Limite… [+1224 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Adani aims to close planned $4 billion fundraising by end-December-source - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The group's flagship, Adani Enterprises, and Adani Green have board approvals to raise around $1.5 billion each, while Adani Transmission is eyeing $1.03 billion through share sales, the companies told Indian exchanges in the past few weeks.
articles.content: Adani Group is aiming to close its planned up to $4 billion fundraising before the end of 2023, and is actively talking to global investors about participating, a source with direct knowledge of the … [+1439 chars]

articles.author: Broker Research
articles.title: Voltas Q1 PAT seen up 31.2% YoY to Rs. 1,428 cr: Nirmal Bang - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Net Sales are expected to increase by 8.3 percent Y-o-Y (up 1.4 percent Q-o-Q) to Rs. 2,996.9 crore, according to Nirmal Bang.
articles.content: Nirmal Bang has come out with its first quarter (April-June 24) earnings estimates for the Consumer Durables sector. The brokerage house expects Voltas to report net profit at Rs. 1,428 crore up 31.2… [+618 chars]
